title: With Chase
description: With ChaseThe Chase Series (Book Three)When Liam Collins was hired to act as the face of hermit-author Chase Preston, he thought he had a good idea what to expect, but now, the situation has changed. Liam finds himself wanting to know more about the real Chase and not the Chase he has to portray to the public. Is the sexual tension between them real?Liam wants answers and breaks his contract’s rules to follow Chase one night. Liam ends up in a strange underground club that doesn’t seem threatening until he meets a cryptic woman who claims to know who he really is. Is Liam’s cover blown? And more importantly, is Liam’s time running out? After letting curiosity get the better of him, Liam Collins finds himself staring down the barrel of a gun and comes face to face with an unexpected savior.
author: J.J. Scotts
